h6601.definition: a primitive root; to open, i.e. be (causatively, make) roomy; usually figuratively (in a mental or moral sense) to be (causatively, make) simple or (in a sinister way) delude; allure, deceive, enlarge, entice, flatter, persuade, silly (one).

h6602.definition: from {{h6601}} and {{h410}}; enlarged of God; Pethuel, an Israelite; Pethuel.

h6603.definition: or פִּתֻּחַ ; passive participle of {{h6605}}; sculpture (in low or high relief or even intaglio); carved (work) (are, en-) grave(-ing, -n).

h6604.definition: of foreign origin; Pethor, a place in Mesopotamia; Pethor.

h6605.definition: a primitive root; to open wide (literally or figuratively); specifically, to loosen, begin, plough, carve; appear, break forth, draw (out), let go free, (en-) grave(-n), loose (self), (be, be set) open(-ing), put off, ungird, unstop, have vent.

h6607.definition: from {{h6605}}; an opening (literally), i.e. door (gate) or entrance way; door, entering (in), entrance (-ry), gate, opening, place.

h6609.definition: from {{h6605}}; something opened, i.e. a drawn sword; drawn sword.

h6611.definition: from {{h6605}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has opened; Pethachjah, the name of four Israelites; Pethakiah.

h6612.definition: or פֶּתִי; or פְּתָאִי; from {{h6601}}; silly (i.e. seducible); foolish, simple(-icity, one).

h6613.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h6601}}; open, i.e. (as noun) width; breadth.

h6614.definition: of uncertain derivation; probably a figured mantle for holidays; stomacher.

h6616.definition: from {{h6617}}; twine; bound, bracelet, lace, line, ribband, thread, wire.

h6617.definition: a primitive root; to twine, i.e. (literally) to struggle or (figuratively) be (morally) tortuous; (shew self) froward, shew self unsavoury, wrestle.

h6619.definition: of Egyptian derivation; Pithom, a place in Egypt; Pithom.

h6620.definition: from an unused root meaning to twist; an asp (from its contortions); adder.

h6621.definition: from an unused root meaning to open (the eyes); (compare {{h6597}}); a wink, i.e. moment (used only [with or without preposition] adverbially, quickly or unexpectedly); at an instant, suddenly, × very.

h6622.definition: a primitive root; to open up, i.e. (figuratively) interpret (a dream); interpret(-ation, -er).

h6623.definition: or פִּתְרֹן; from {{h6622}}; interpretation (of a dream); interpretation.

h6624.definition: of Egyptian derivation; Pathros, a part of Egypt; Pathros.

h6625.definition: patrial from {{h6624}}; a Pathrusite, or inhabitant of Pathros; Pathrusim.

h6626.definition: a primitive root; to open, i.e. break; participle x

h6627.definition: from {{h3318}}; issue, i.e. (human) excrement; that (which) cometh from (out).

h6628.definition: from an unused root meaning to be slender; the lotus tree; shady tree.

h6629.definition: or צאוֹן; (Psalm 144:13), from an unused root meaning to migrate; a collective name for a flock (of sheep or goats); also figuratively (of men); (small) cattle, flock (  -s), lamb (  -s), sheep(-cote, -fold, -shearer, -herds).

h6630.definition: from the same as {{h6629}} used denominatively; sheep pasture; Zaanan, a place in Palestine; Zaanan.

h6631.definition: from {{h3318}}; issue, i.e. produce, children; that which cometh forth (out), offspring.

h6632.definition: from an unused root meaning to establish; a palanquin or canopy (as a fixture); also a species of lizard (probably as clinging fast); covered, litter, tortoise.

h6633.definition: a primitive root; to mass (an army or servants); assemble, fight, perform, muster, wait upon, war.

h6634.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6623}} in the figurative sense of summoning one's wishes; to please; will, would.

h6635.definition: or (feminine) צְבָאָה; from {{h6633}}; a mass of persons (or figuratively, things), especially reg. organized for war (an army); by implication, a campaign, literally or figuratively (specifically, hardship, worship); appointed time, ( ) army, ( ) battle, company, host, service, soldiers, waiting upon, war(-fare).

h6636.definition: or (more correctly) צְבִיִּים; or צְבִיִּם; plural of {{h6643}}; gazelles; Tseboim or Tsebijim, a place in Palestine; Zeboiim, Zeboim.

h6637.definition: feminine active participle of the same as {{h6632}}; the canopier (with the article); Tsobebah, an Israelitess; Zobebah.

h6638.definition: a primitive root; to amass, i.e. grow turgid; specifically, to array an army against; fight swell.

h6640.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h6634}}; properly, will; concretely, an affair (as a matter of determination); purpose.

h6641.definition: passive participle of the same as {{h6648}}; dyed (in stripes), i.e. the hyena; speckled.

h6642.definition: a primitive root; to grasp, i.e. hand out; reach.

h6643.definition: from {{h6638}} in the sense of prominence; splendor (as conspicuous); beautiful(-ty), glorious (-ry), goodly, pleasant, roe(-buck).

h6646.definition: feminine of {{h6643}}; a female gazelle; roe.

h6647.definition: (Aramaic) a root corresponding to that of {{h6648}}; to dip; wet.

h6648.definition: from an unused root meaning to dip (into coloring fluid); a dye; divers, colours.

h6649.definition: from the same as {{h6648}}; variegated; Tsibon, an Idumaean; Zibeon.

h6650.definition: plural of {{h6641}}; hyenas; Tseboim, a place in Palestine; Zeboim.

h6651.definition: a primitive root; to aggregate; gather (together), heap (up), lay up.

h6653.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to grip; a lock of stalks; handful.

h6654.definition: contr. from an unused root meaning to sidle off; a side; figuratively, an adversary; (be-) side.

h6655.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6654}}; used adverbially (with preposition) at or upon the side of; against, concerning.

h6656.definition: (Aramaic) from an unused root corresponding to {{h6658}} in the sense of intentness; a (sinister) design; true.

h6657.definition: from the same as {{h6654}}; a siding; Tsedad, a place near Palestine; Zedad.

h6658.definition: a primitive root; to chase; by implication, to desolate; destroy, hunt, lie in wait.

h6659.definition: from {{h6663}}; just; Tsadok, the name of eight or nine Israelites; Zadok.

h6661.definition: plural of {{h6654}}; sides; Tsiddim (with the article), a place in Palestine; Ziddim.

h6663.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, make) right (in a moral or forensic sense); cleanse, clear self, (be, do) just(-ice, -ify, -ify self), (be turn to) righteous(-ness).

h6664.definition: from {{h6663}}; the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity; × even, (× that which is altogether) just(-ice), (un-)right(-eous) (cause, -ly, -ness).

h6666.definition: from {{h6663}}; rightness (abstractly), subjectively (rectitude), objectively (justice), morally (virtue) or figuratively (prosperity); justice, moderately, right(-eous) (act, -ly, -ness).

h6667.definition: or צִדְקִיָּהוּ; from {{h6664}} and {{h3050}}; right of Jah; Tsidkijah, the name of six Israelites; Zedekiah, Zidkijah.

h6668.definition: a primitive root; to glitter, i.e. be golden in color; × fine.

h6670.definition: a primitive root; to gleam, i.e. (figuratively) be cheerful; by transference to sound clear (of various animal or human expressions); bellow, cry aloud (out), lift up, neigh, rejoice, make to shine, shout.

h6671.definition: a primitive root; to glisten; used only as denominative from {{h3323}},; to press out oil; make oil.

h6672.definition: from {{h6671}}; a light (i.e. window); dual double light, i.e. noon; midday, noon(-day, -tide), window.

h6673.definition: or צָו; from {{h6680}}; an injunction; commandment, precept.

h6674.definition: or צֹא; from an unused root meaning to issue; soiled (as if excrementitious); filthy.

h6675.definition: or צֹאָה ; feminine of {{h6674}}; excrement; generally, dirt; figuratively, pollution; dung, filth(-iness). Marg. for {{h2716}}.

h6677.definition: or צַוָּר; (Nehemiah 3:5), or צַוָּרֹןlemma צַוָּרן missing vowel, corrected to צַוָּרֹן; (Song of Solomon 4:9), or (feminine) צַוָּארָה; (Micah 2:3), intensively from {{h6696}} in the sense of binding; the back of the neck (as that on which burdens are bound); neck.

h6678.definition: or צוֹבָה; or צֹבָה; from an unused root meaning to station; a station; Zoba or Zobah, a region of Syria; Zoba, Zobah.

h6679.definition: a primitive root; also denominative from {{h6718}}; to lie alongside (i.e. in wait); by implication, to catch an animal (figuratively, men); to victual (for a journey); chase, hunt, sore, take (provision).

h6680.definition: a primitive root; (intensively) to constitute, enjoin; appoint, (for-) bid, (give a) charge, (give a, give in, send with) command(-er, -ment), send a messenger, put, (set) in order.

h6681.definition: a primitive root; to screech (exultingly); shout.

h6683.definition: from an unused root meaning to sink; an abyss (of the sea); deep.

h6684.definition: a primitive root; to cover over (the mouth), i.e. to fast; × at all, fast.

h6685.definition: or צֹם; from {{h6684}}; a fast; fast(-ing).

h6686.definition: from {{h6819}}; small; Tsuär, an Israelite; Zuar.

h6687.definition: a primitive root; to overflow; (make to over-) flow, swim.

h6688.definition: from {{h6687}}; comb of honey (from dripping); honeycomb.

h6689.definition: or צוֹפַי; or צִיף; from {{h6688}}; honey-comb; Tsuph or Tsophai or Tsiph, the name of an Israelite and of a place in Palestine; Zophai, Zuph.

h6690.definition: from an unused root meaning to expand, breadth; Tsophach, an Israelite; Zophah.

h6691.definition: from {{h6852}}; departing; Tsophar, a friend of Job; Zophar.

h6692.definition: a primitive root; to twinkle, i.e. glance; by analogy, to blossom (figuratively, flourish); bloom, blossom, flourish, shew self.

h6693.definition: a primitive root; to compress, i.e. (figuratively) oppress, distress; constrain, distress, lie sore, (op-) press(-or), straiten.

h6694.definition: a primitive root (identical with through the idea of narrowness (of orifice)); to pour out, i.e. (figuratively) smelt, utter; be molten, pour.

h6695.definition: or (feminine) צוּקָה; from {{h6693}}; a strait, i.e. (figuratively) distress; anguish, × troublous.

h6696.definition: a primitive root; to cramp, i.e. confine (in many applications, literally and figuratively, formative or hostile); adversary, assault, beset, besiege, bind (up), cast, distress, fashion, fortify, inclose, lay siege, put up in bags.

h6697.definition: or צֻר; from {{h6696}}; properly, a cliff (or sharp rock, as compressed); generally, a rock or boulder; figuratively, a refuge; also an edge (as precipitous); edge, × (mighty) God (one), rock, × sharp, stone, × strength, × strong. See also {{h1049}}.

h6698.definition: the same as {{h6697}}; rock; Tsur, the name of a Midianite and of an Israelite; Zur.

h6699.definition: feminine of {{h6697}}; a rock (Job 28:10); also a form (as if pressed out); form, rock.

h6700.definition: from {{h6697}} and {{h410}}; rock of God; Tsuriël, an Israelite; Zuriel.
